content.raw:
This problem still exists in the latest versions of the branches gazebo9 as well as in the default\(Gazebo10?\). It is very sad and unfortunate that the gpu\_ray doses not get enough attention even though the problem is well known and multiple bug report is filed. 

Below I have attached screenshots of the CPU version and the GPU version of the generated cloud. 

Using gpu\_ray

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2183769347-velpdyne_gpu_error.png)
‌

Using ray sensor \(CPU\)

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1196754289-velodyne_cpu.png)
